creatSql: create table bamboo_project(id integer not null   constraint bamboo_project_pk   primary key autoincrement,project_name  text,project_path  text);
index: create unique index bamboo_project_id_uindex on bamboo_project (id);

creatSql: create table bamboo_class(id    text not null  constraint bamboo_class_pk  primary key,class_name  text,model_name  text,description text,class_path  text,project_id  text,setting_id  text);
index: create unique index bamboo_class_id_uindex on bamboo_class (id);

creatSql: create table bamboo_method(id  text not null constraint bamboo_api_method_pk  primary key,project_id  text not null,method_name text,class_id  text,description  text);
index: create unique index bamboo_method_id_uindex on bamboo_method (id);

creatSql: create table bamboo_api(id  text not null constraint bamboo_api_pk primary key,method_id  text,url text,request_methods text,project_id   text,params   text,headers  text,consumes text,produces  text);
index: create unique index bamboo_api_id_uindex on bamboo_api (id);

creatSql: create table annotation_param_setting(id  integer not null constraint annotation_param_pk primary key autoincrement,name  text,type  text,describe  text,annotation_info_setting_id integer);

creatSql: create table annotation_method_scope(id   integer not null constraint annotation_method_scope_pk primary key autoincrement,annotation_id integer,method_scope  text);
index: create unique index annotation_method_scope_id_uindex on annotation_method_scope (id);
datas: INSERT INTO annotation_method_scope (id, annotation_id, method_scope) VALUES (1, 11, 'public');

creatSql: create table framework(id       integer not null  constraint framework_pk  primary key autoincrement,name   text,describe text);
index: create unique index framework_id_uindex  on framework (id);
datas: INSERT INTO framework (id, name, describe) VALUES (1, 'Spring', 'Spring');
INSERT INTO framework (id, name, describe) VALUES (2, 'o_dian_yun', 'o_dian_yun');

creatSql: create table bamboo_method_return_type( id text not null constraint bamboo_method_return_type_pk primary key, return_type   text, return_type_path text, method_id   text);
index: create unique index bamboo_method_return_type_id_uindex on bamboo_method_return_type (id);

creatSql: create table bamboo_method_param( id   text not null constraint bamboo_method_param_pk primary key, param_type text,param_type_path text, param_name text, param_index  integer, method_id  text not null);
index: create unique index bamboo_method_param_id_uindex on bamboo_method_param (id);

creatSql: create table bamboo_desc_framework ( framework text, id text not null constraint bamboo_desc_framework_pk primary key, framework_code text, describe text, sequence integer );
index: create unique index bamboo_desc_framework_id_uindex on bamboo_desc_framework (id);

creatSql: create table bamboo_dict ( id text not null constraint bamboo_dict_pk primary key, key text, value text, description text );
index: create unique index bamboo_dict_id_uindex on bamboo_dict (id);

creatSql: create table bamboo_desc ( id text not null constraint bamboo_desc_pk primary key, describe text, frameword_code text, association_id text );
index: create unique index bamboo_desc_id_uindex on bamboo_desc (id);
